name: STLTHSCP - PICO-8 Port of Stealthscape
description:
This is a PICO-8 port of Stealthscape, a top-down momentum based speed game that has you pitted against a wide variety of enemies and obstacles while you try to quickly make your way to the portal at the end of each stage.

This was my first ever PICO-8 project and I made it in ~1 week, so I'm really happy with the outcome. Check out Stealthscape on Steam if you enjoy! https://store.steampowered.com/app/670720/Stealthscape/
